H0.text: who sang the theme song to that 70s show. Cheap Trick

H1.text: who sang the theme song to that 70s show. The Rolling Stones

H2.text: who sang the theme song to that 70s show. Weezer

H3.text: who sang the theme song to that 70s show. Big Star

A4.text: Cheap Trick recorded a cover of Big Star's 1972 song 'In the Street' that was used as the theme song for the Fox sitcom That '70s Show.

A5.text: The theme song for That '70s Show was a cover of Big Star's song, not performed by Big Star themselves.
